title: The Poisoned Stage
description: During a prestigious theater performance, the lead actor collapses mid-scene and later dies from poisoning. The poison was found in a water bottle on the dressing room table. Only a few individuals had access to the area and the refreshments before the show.

A.name: The Understudy
A.description: Stood to gain fame and the lead role.

B.name: The Stage Manager
B.description: Handled props and managed access to the dressing rooms.

C.name: The Ex-Spouse
C.description: Had a history of public arguments with the actor.

D.name: The Rival Actor
D.description: Had a long-standing feud over roles.

E.name: The Catering Assistant
E.description: Was responsible for drinks and food in the green room.

evidence.label: Someone Was Seen Near Dressing Room
